data.title: Requeijão
data.meta_description: Brazilian Cream Cheese Ingredients 250ml whole milk; 1 tsp Maldon salt; 50g unsalted butter; 100g mild English Cheddar cheese, grated (or 70g cow's Mozzarella plus 30g Parmesan cheese, grated); 100g evaporated milk; 40g potato starch. Method 1. In a saucepan mix together the milk, the salt, the butter and the potato starch. Turn the heat on and stir well…
